info.name: Clever Photo Gallery
info.description:
The **Photo Gallery API** powers a modern photo-sharing platform that allows users to register, log in, view photos, like/unlike them, and manage their accounts.

Built with Django REST Framework and secured using JWTs stored in HTTP-only cookies, the API emphasizes performance, security, and developer experience.  

### ‚úÖ Key Features

- üîê **Authentication** ‚Äì Secure login, logout, and token refresh using JWT
    
- üë§ **User Management** ‚Äì Register, update profile, change password, reset password
    
- üñºÔ∏è **Photo Browsing** ‚Äì List all photos with support for search, filtering, ordering, and pagination
    
- ‚ù§Ô∏è **Likes** ‚Äì Like/unlike photos and view photos liked by the user
    
- ‚öôÔ∏è **Health Check** ‚Äì Public endpoint to monitor database, Redis, email config, and system health
    
- üõ°Ô∏è **Rate Limiting** ‚Äì Applied to critical endpoints like login and register

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Used to create a new user in the system.

response.name: Error - Empty Body
Error - Invalid Details

request.description: Used to log a user in. The system uses http only cookies for auth

item.name: Photos

query.description: The maximum number of records to return
The page that the records should be from
Searches the photographer's name or alt text
The field that you want to order by. Can be one of `["id", "width", "height", "created_at"]`

response.name: Success - Pagination

query.description: The maximum number of records to return
The page that the records should be from

response.body:
{
